sentences.en: I have never seen such a shambles in my life.
sentences.cn: 我一辈子都没见过这么乱七八糟的场面。

sentences.en: I know my mind is a shambles.
sentences.cn: 我知道自己的思想乱七八糟.

sentences.en: Out of the ashes of the economic shambles, a phoenix of recovery can arise.
sentences.cn: 在经济废墟中可能孕育着经济复苏的苗头。

sentences.en: The economy is in a shambles.
The fighting reduced the city to a shambles.
sentences.cn: 这场战斗使这座城市成了一片废墟.

sentences.en: The floors where they occurred were a burned - out shambles.
sentences.cn: 出事的几层楼变成一堆烧焦了的废墟,狼藉不堪.

sentences.en: The meeting ended in a complete shambles.
The press conference was a complete shambles.
The ship's interior was an utter shambles.

sentences.cn: 那个疲倦的老人蹒跚而行.

sentences.en: We regard the band as a thorough shambles.
sentences.cn: 我们认为那个乐队一塌糊涂。

sentences.en: Your room is ( in ) a shambles. Tidy it up!
sentences.cn: 你的房间乱七八糟. 把它整理一下吧!

trans.tran_cn: <口>混乱，屠宰场，毁坏（景象），大屠杀场面
trans.tran_en: If a place, event, or situation is a shambles or is in a shambles, everything is in disorder

trans.tran_cn: 蹒跚而行，拖着脚走，踉跄地走( shamble的第三人称单数)
